name: Colour Code
description:
In Colour Code, you must try to reach the end of each level and defeat the final boss at the end! Enemies are coloured either red, blue or yellow. You can only damage enemies by shooting them with the corresponding colour.

Controls:

a,d - move left/right

w,s - cycle between colour types

i, k - aim gun up and down

l - shoot laser (semi automatic)

This is the first game that I've submitted for a Ludum Dare, with the theme of 'An Unconventional Weapon', as well as the first game that I've coded.
